files.patch: @@ -138,2 +138,2 @@ - * pi, the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its - * diameter. + * pi (π), the ratio of the circumference of a circle to + * its diameter. @@ -143,0 +143,13 @@ + /** + * The {@code double} value that is closer than any other to + * tau (τ), the ratio of the circumference of a circle + * to its radius. + * + * @apiNote + * The value of pi is one half that of tau; in other + * words, tau is double pi . + * + * @since 19 + */ + public static final double TAU = 6.283185307179586; +

@@ -99,1 +99,1 @@ - * pi, the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its + * pi (π), the ratio of the circumference of a circle to its @@ -104,0 +104,13 @@ + /** + * The {@code double} value that is closer than any other to + * tau (τ), the ratio of the circumference of a circle + * to its radius. + * + * @apiNote + * The value of pi is one half that of tau; in other + * words, tau is double pi . + * + * @since 19 + */ + public static final double TAU = 6.283185307179586; +
